lines.dialogue: Ab bhi jiska khoon na khaula, khoon nahi woh paani hai, Jo desh k kaam na aae woh bekar jawaani hai.

lines.information: CloseUp: A man putting kajal in his eyes, one eye at a time.
A man, 30s sitting in lotus position, pouring water on his head using a copper vessel and chanting mantras.
A man, 30s, with combed hair, standing, looking at the ventilation, turns towards the cell gate on hearing a sound in the corridor.
The camera moved towards the adjacent cell.
A man, 30s, sitting in the chair, turned when an english officer reached his cell gate and opened it.

lines.dialogue: Zara rukiye Mr. McKinley. Ek krantikari ki dusre krantikari se mulaakat ho rahi hai.

lines.information: Sukhdev is reading a book by Lenin.

lines.dialogue: Kaash, sab kuch is tarah khatam nahi hota.

lines.information: Sukhdev stands up from the chair and walks towards McKinley.

lines.dialogue: Ye ant kaha hai Mr. McKinley. Ye toh shuruat hai.
